Deletion or modification of network conn.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4663 for deletion events targeting known RDP history files (.rdp, cache files) or common log file locations. Monitor Windows Event ID 4657 for modifications to RDP registry keys (HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Terminal Server Client). Analyze Zeek fileinfo.log for deletion events on relevant paths. Look for patterns or frequency anomalies in deletion/modification events.

Unexpected changes to network configurat.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4719 for changes to system audit policy. Monitor Windows Event ID 5025, 5027, 5031 for changes to Windows Firewall rules or service state. Correlate configuration changes with unexpected network behavior observed in Zeek logs (notice.log). Identify changes not associated with standard administrative activity. Use time series analysis to spot unexpected spikes in configuration change events.
